title: Productive Failure-Based Workshop for Enhancing Collaborative Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Providing a structured collaborative framework to minimize participation gaps among learners.

learning_goals: Learners can exchange feedback at least three times across problem-definition-to-solution stages in 4-member team activities
Learners can present at least two cases of transforming collaboration conflicts into creative problem-solving strategies
Learners can propose improved collaboration plans with over 80% team satisfaction after analyzing failure cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
